cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.SI, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with signal processing and sampling techniques, which are typically covered in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Signal Processing (cs.SP) sub-categories. The use of optical systems and the focus on undersampling also suggest the Signal Processing and Information Theory sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of linear equations for signal reconstruction, which falls under the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses the robustness of the proposed scheme to noise, which is a common concern in the Signal Processing and Information Theory sub-categories, as well as the Systems and Control (cs.SI) sub-category.
